deal.product_description: The Refurbished Unlocked Samsung Galaxy S21 offers exceptional capabilities with its 256GB storage and 5G connectivity. This smartphone boasts a stunning 6.2-inch 2400x1080 display and features an advanced Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor. It includes a versatile camera setup with a 64MP telephoto lens, along with 12MP wide and ultra-wide cameras, catering to photography enthusiasts. With a one-year Allstate warranty, this certified refurbished device is an excellent choice for those seeking high performance at a great value.
